Happy: Happiness is a journey, not a destination.
Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
Do more of what makes you happy.
Sad: Tears are words that need to be written.
You are stronger than you think.
Crying is not a sign of weakness, it's a sign of being human.
Angry: Breathe in calm, breathe out stress.
Don't let your anger control you.
Speak when you are calm, not when you are angry.
Anger is just one letter short of danger.
Tired: Rest is not a waste of time.
Take time to do nothing - it's part of the plan.
Even machines need to shut down to work well again.
Anxious: You don't have to control your thoughts. Just stop letting them control you.
Let go of the things you can't control.
You've survived 100% of your worst days. You can survive this too.
Peace begins with a single breath.
Excited: The energy you feel is your soul saying yes.
Excitement is the spark that lights your fire.
Keep the excitement alive - it's fuel for action.
Something wonderful is about to happen.
Lonely: You are not alone, even when you feel like it.
Sometimes you need to step outside, get some air, and remind yourself who you are.
Being alone doesn't mean being unloved.
The night is darkest just before the dawn.
Someone out there feels the same way - you're never truly alone.
Inspired: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Small steps every day lead to big results.
Your only limit is your mind.
Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
